name: Gotta Get Stinkier 3D!
description:
It's your first day of school at Notebook High! You wonder what kind of people you will encounter. Wait...what's that weird smell???

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, click and drag with the left mouse button to move the camera.

Music : Fun days by f@ct

This game is based on an earlier twine prototype: gotta get stinkier

----------------

Tips without spoiling the game too much:

  • Coins can be exchanged for goods and services...well mostly goods...a very specific one in this school!
  • Go to class! Mr. Noel has many different types of assignments you can do, that's the whole point of school, right?
  • Certain characters might aid you in your quest, while others will impede any progress! And some might even do both, depending on how well you know your stuff. (so definitely do your assignments okay!!!)
